content.prompt: In the context of the passage as a whole, the author’s description of her teacher’s views in the middle of the first paragraph (“I am quite . . . questioned”) is best characterized as a

choices.label: frank reconsideration of an early assessment of the teacher’s intelligence
careful reflection on the biases that influenced her teacher’s judgment
calculated effort to expose an unfit teacher to the public’s disapproval
satisfying resolution to a long-standing puzzle from the author’s youth

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
